# Insignia of Blessing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Long (400 ft. + 40 ft./level)

**Target:** All wearers of special insignia within range

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Races of Destiny (WotC), pg. 166

This spell functions just like *[[Insignia of Alarm (Spell)|insignia of alarm]]* except that the insignia wearers are also filled with courage. Each insignia wearer gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and on saving throws against fear effects.
